“Oh no! My computer isn’t working!”

scripts.name: Design a Vacuum Cleaner Salesman
scripts.text: An AM Man enters dressed as a salesman, carrying his briefcase. The AM Man is in his thirties, has brown hair, a pointy nose, a friendly face, and speaks with a kind of nasal, slightly annoying voice.
